name: Time Machine: Rogue Pilot
description:
Time Machine: Rogue Pilot offers a brand new approach to puzzle games genre taking the best from classic match 3 experience and combining it with the innovative hidden objects gameplay. Dozens of story mode missions that will fascinate you and can be played with a friend online or on the same screen! Plus the game also offers several bonus modes – all of this coming along with dazzling graphics, ambient background music and rich visual effects.

- More than 50 levels in story mode
- 6 bonus modes
- Play with your friends online or on the same screen
- Innovative hidden objects levels as an addition to match 3 missions
- Full HD support
- Go all the way from the Stone Age to the high-tech future!
